Total Number of Times Relied upon by Agency
50 U.S.C., Section 3507 (formerly codified at 50 U.S.C., Section 403g)

E.g., CIA budget information and information relating to the organization, functions, names, official titles, salaries or numbers of personnel employed by the CIA, including information relating to intelligence sources and methods.

Halperin V. CIA, 629 F.2d 144 (D.C. Cir. 1980); Minier V. CIA, 88 F.3d 796 (9th Cir. 1996); Larson v. Dep't of State, 565 F.3d 857 n.2 (D.C. Cir. 2009); Berman v. CIA, 501 F.3d 1136, 1137-38, 1140 (9th Cir. 2007); Makky v. Chertoff, 489 F. Supp. 2d 421, 442 (D.N.J. 2007) aff'd on other grounds, 541 F.ed 205 (3d Cir. 2008)
